KemenPAN RB Larang Penggunaan Cadar di Kantor
04 Nov 2019, 16:46 by Wuri Damaryanti Suparjo


KemenPAN RB Larang Penggunaan Cadar di Kantor

KBRN, Yogyakarta : ASN di Kementrian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi dilarang menggunakan cadar di kantor, agar tidak ganggu komunikasi.Menteri Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (Menpan RB) Tjahjo Kumolo melarang aparatur sipil negara (ASN) di Kementerian PAN RB menggunakan cadar.MenPAN RB Tjahjo Kumolo usai menghadiri penilaian Akuntabilitas Kinerja Instansi Pemerintah (AKIP) dan Reformasi Birokrasi tahun 2019 lingkup Pemda DIY dan Pemkab/Kota oleh Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi RI di Kepatihan Kantor Gubernur DI Yogyakarta, mengatakan larangan memakai cadar wajib dipatuhi ASN di kementeriannya, saat beraktivitas di kantor.Hanya Kalau di kantor bagi saya ya jangan pakai cadar. Kalau pakai cadar di luar kantor silahkan, itukan hak warga negara dalam berpakaian tapi kalau itu kerja dimana kan ada aturan," katanya Senin (4/11/2019).Menurutnya, pihaknya hanya melarang penggunaan cadar saat di kantor karena dikhawatirkan mengganggu komunikasi, namun pihaknya tidak melarang penggunaan jilbab bagi ASN."Bagaimana saya mau ketemu ketika pakai cadar, muslim silahkan pakai jilbab itu hak masing-masing," jelasnya.Sementara itu, Gubernur DIY Sri Sultan HB X menyatakan menunggu aturan pemerintah pusat jika memang kebijakan pelarangan penggunaan cadar. Menurut Sultan, pemda DIY tidak pernah mengurusi persoalan itu. Selama ini juga tidak ditemukan ASN menggunakan cadar kecuali masker antisipasi debu, atau sedang sakit."Enggak tau saya itukan kebijakan pusat bukan daerah wewenang belum ada gak pernah urusi itu," jelasnya.MenPAN RB Tjahjo Kumolo menambahkan, masing-masing kepala daerah, pimpinan lembaga dan Kementerian memiliki hak mengatur pegawainya. Termasuk mengatur tata cara berpakaian ketika ASN berada di kantor.Â

KemenPAN RB prohibits the use of veils in offices
04 Nov 2019, 16:46 by Wuri Damaryanti Suparjo


KemenPAN RB prohibits the use of veils in offices

KBRN, Yogyakarta: ASN in the Ministry of State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform is prohibited from using the veil in the office, so as not to disturb communication. Minister of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (Menpan RB) Tjahjo Kumolo prohibits the state civil apparatus (ASN) in the Ministry of PAN RB from using the veil. .MENPAN RB Tjahjo Kumolo after attending the assessment of the Performance Accountability of Government Agencies (AKIP) and Bureaucratic Reform in 2019 the scope of the Regional Government of DIY and Regency / City by the Ministry of Administrative Reform and the Bureaucratic Reform of the Republic of Indonesia in the Office of the Governor of Yogyakarta, said that the ban on wearing the veil must be adhered to by the National Government of DIY and Regency / City. in his ministry, while on the move at the office. Only in the office for me, don't wear the veil. If you use the veil outside the office please, that's the right of citizens to dress but if it's work where there are rules, "he said Monday (11/04/2019). According to him, his party only banned the use of the veil while in the office because it was feared to interfere with communication, but "How do I want to meet when wearing the veil, Muslims please wear the veil of their respective rights," he explained. According to the Sultan, the DIY regional government has never dealt with the issue. So far, ASN has not found a veil except for the anticipation of dust masks, or being sick. "I don't know whether the central policy is not an area of authority that I have never dealt with," he explained. RB Tjahjo Kumolo added that each regional head, institution leader and the Ministry had the right to regulate their employees, including regulating the administration how to dress when ASN is in the office.
